short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension emulates Netscape's crypto.signText() using LSF.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Emulates the crypto.signText() API as close as possible, so it acts as a drop-in/polyfill solution to access legacy websites and web apps, who require PKCS#11 digital signatures.
